replies.body: Hey it’s Mandraeus! Just here to say that my name is misspelled, I probably messed up the spelling during submission. I can prove it’s me though I have the original file on aseprite.

Whoopsie that one's on us! You did spell it correctly, we misspelt it when we created the post. I'm afraid that one won't get fixed until tomorrow, but I can confirm your name for prizing (which will take a day or two) is correct :)

P.S I absolutely adore the Azir!

Hey, this spelling mistake is 100% my fault sorry about that! Pushed through an update which fixed it though. Thanks for flagging!

{{sticker:katarina-love}}
thank you for letting me win. Also, what time are the prizes coming

As soon as possible, which may be a day or two. We wanted to get the announcement out even if we couldn't prize straight away so people could decide what to spend their tokens/RP on before the limited-time content goes away.
Were there less than 10 entries to the comic wave?
There were yes. Given the timing and the size of the contest, we did expect to get less entries for this one.
